name: Name
Intro Text: Manage your tasks, build your daily routine, and stay focused – all in one simple and powerful app. Get started today!
MiddleBlock Text: Check It Out helps you organize your day with a clean, customizable interface and full task tracking – all without needing any coding knowledge.
About Text: Check It Out is ready to use out of the box – but you can easily tweak it to match your personal workflow and style if you want.
About Section Content 1: It’s a clean and intuitive task manager that helps you stay focused and organized – without the complexity.
About Section Content 2: Everyone works differently. Check It Out lets you shape your task flow and reminders to fit your unique daily rhythm.
Mission Title: All the tools you need, ready to go
Mission Text: Check It Out comes with built-in features to help you plan, organize, and track your daily tasks with ease. No setup hassle – just add your tasks and start your most productive day yet!
Product Content Text: Check It Out is built to be simple and intuitive – no tech skills required. But if you ever get stuck, feel free to reach out and we’ll help you get the most out of your daily planning.
Contact Text: Got a question about Check It Out? We’d love to hear from you! Just fill out the quick contact form below and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
Notification Success Description: Your message has been sent successfully!
Notification Error Description: There was an error sending your message, please try again later.
Notification Error Fallback: Form submission failed. Please try again later.
Validation Password Length: Password must be at least 6 characters long!
Login No Account: Don’t have an account? Sign up now!
Login Error 2: The email address is not registered
404 Description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
Register Have Account: Already have an account? Log in
Logout Text: Are you sure you want to log out?
AddTaskDescription: Fill out the form to create a new task
MustBeFutureDate: Date must be in the future
TaskCreateError: Error occurred while creating the task.
CategoryCreateError: Error occurred while creating the category.
CategoryCreateErrorConsole: Error occurred while creating the category:
MustStartWithCapital: The name must start with a capital letter.
